description: Iterative TDD cycle: Red → Green → Refactor → repeat

complete.green-phase: Failing test is written and documented

blocked.core: Cannot write test - missing requirements or unclear specification

complete.refactor-phase: All tests pass and implementation is sufficient

failed.red-phase: Tests fail or implementation approach is incorrect - test needs revision

blocked.core: Cannot implement - architectural constraints or missing dependencies

complete.core: Code is refactored, all tests pass, feature is production-ready

ready-for-next-iteration.red-phase: Feature needs more work, edge cases, or additional iterations

blocked.core: Cannot refactor further - architectural constraints require human decision
